Hi All,

I have been using cantera for simulating laminar 2d flame for 
hyd=
rogen air gas combination. 

I do a ZeroD simulation using Cantera to get t=
he species production 
rate and the energy production rate. I have my own f=
low solver. In 
order to do ZeroD simulation, I create a container, place i=
t in the 
reactor and reservoir, install a wall as given in the ZeroD demo =

program.

Then I set the state of the gas in every grid cell and advance t=
he 
time based on my flow solver by "dt". But somehow, I get a CVODE 
error=
.

--------------------------------------------------------------------
CVo=
de-- At t =3D 8.63212e-12, mxstep steps taken before reaching tout.



****=
********************************************
                   Cantera Err=
or!
************************************************


Procedure: CVodesInt=
egrator
Error:      CVodes error encountered.
 
---------------------------=
----------------------------------------

EXAMPLE OF MY CODE:

     call ne=
wIdealGasMix('h2thermtran.cti','','Mix')
     call reactor()
     call rese=
rvoir()
     call wall()
     call reactornet()
     call wallinstall()
   =
  call wallexpansionratecoeff()

do ijk =3D 1,npx*npy
     call setState_TR=
Y(temp1, q(ijk, 1),massfrac)

     call setinitialtime(0)
     call insert(=
)
     call insertreserv()
     call advance(dt)


     call getNetProducti=
onRates(qi)
     call getEnthalpy_RT(src)
end do


########################=
###################

Kindly, help me with this problem. I am stuck with it =
for a while. 
It would be great if you can let me know whether my way of 
i=
mplementation is correct, and provide me with your useful comments 
which c=
an be useful to me.

Best Regards,
Gaurav
